name: Alexander Medvedev
content: Alexander Medvedev, Professor Alexander Medvedev Publications Brief CV Service to scientific community Current projects Ph D students Uppsala University : Information technology : Systems and Control : Alexander Medvedev, Professor Director of Program in Automatic Control I carry out research projects and teach courses in Control Engineering Current theoretical interests: Parameter and state estimation in dynamic systems, in particular Orthonormal bases in systems theory Periodic modes in nonlinear and hybrid systems Fault detection Recursive estimation Current applied interests: Endocrine systems, mathematical modeling, estimation, and control Human smooth pursuit, mathematical modeling Model-based drug delivery Deep brain stimulation Previous applied interests: Insect vision, mathematical modeling Steel converter (LD) Blast furnace Induction machines, faulty Active vibration control Echo cancelation Pressurized systems, leakage detection Current and former industrial partners: SAAB Systems, ABB Corporate Research, ABB Robotics, Volvo Cars, Volvo Aero, SSAB Oxelösund, SSAB Tunnplåt, LKAB, Bombardier Transportation, Boliden, Assi Domän (Kappa). Teaching: Embedded control systems Automatic control III Senast ändrad: 2017-06-07Ansvarig enhet: Systems and Control © 2003. UPPSALA UNIVERSITET Department of Information Technology Uppsala University Lägerhyddsvägen 2, building 2, room 2342 P.O. Box 337 SE-751 05 Uppsala Email: alexander.medvedev"at"it.uu.se. Exchange "at" for "@" manually! Phone: +46(0)18-4713064
